module.name: qBTorrentsFiles
module.short: Unit containing a container for torrent's files.

descr.p: This unit contains a set of objects that contain the torrent's files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile
element.short: Container class for a single file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Name
element.short: The name of the file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Size
element.short: The size in bytes of the file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Progress
element.short: How much percent of the file has been downloaded.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Priority
element.short: The priority for this file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.IsSeed
element.short: If this file is seed.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Create
element.short: Creates the file object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Create.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Create.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data contaning a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Create.aJSONObj
element.short: A JSON Object contaning a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Create.aStream
element.short: A TStream contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Load
element.short: Loads the contents of a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Load.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Load.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data contaning a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Load.aJSONObj
element.short: A JSON Object contaning a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFile.Load.aStream
element.short: A TStream contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles
element.short: Container class for the torrent's files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.Items
element.short: Property to access the list of TqBTorrentsFile by index.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.Files
element.short: Property to access the list of TqBTorrentsFile by file name.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.GetEnumerator
element.short: Returns the enumerator class for this object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.GetEnumerator.Result
element.short: The returned enumerator class for Files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.LoadFiles
element.short: Loads the contents of a series of files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.LoadFiles.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String containing an Array of files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.LoadFiles.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data containing the files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.LoadFiles.aJSONArray
element.short: A JSON Array containing the files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.LoadFiles.aStream
element.short: A TStream containing an Array of files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFiles
element.short: Updates the contents of a series of files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFiles.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String containing an Array of files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFiles.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data containing the files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFiles.aJSONArray
element.short: A JSON Array containing the files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFiles.aStream
element.short: A TStream containing an Array of files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFile
element.short: Updates the contents of a single files identified by a URL.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFile.aFileName
element.short: The url of the file to be updated.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFile.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFile.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data containing the files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFile.aJSONObj
element.short: A JSON Object contaning a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFiles.UpdateFile.aStream
element.short: A TStream contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's file.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator
element.short: Implements the enumerator for Files.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator.Create
element.short: Creates the enumerator object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator.Create.AFiles
element.short: The object containing the Files list.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator.GetCurrent
element.short: Returns the current File in the enumerator.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator.GetCurrent.Result
element.short: The returned current File.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator.MoveNext
element.short: Tries to move to the next File, returning False if end reached.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator.MoveNext.Result
element.short: Returns True if moved to next, False if reached end of list.

element.name: TqBTorrentsFilesEnumerator.Current
element.short: Property containing the current Tracker on the enumerator.

element.name: PriorityToStr
element.short: Translates from a numerical value priority into a human readable String.

element.name: PriorityToStr.aPriority
element.short: The priority to be translated.

element.name: PriorityToStr.Result
element.short: The translated String.
